amendment.description: An amendment numbered 258 printed in Part B of House Report 116-119 to prohibit any funds from being used to bar or limit DACA recipients from receiving mortgage loans backed by FHA, solely on the basis of their status as DACA recipients.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Vargas amendment (A089) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Vargas amendment (A089) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A089) offered by Mr. Vargas.
